title: Replace existing CV with newly uploaded file

requirements.text: Replace the existing CV file 'Engr. Jerry E. Osiobe CV.pdf' in frontend/public/assets/ directory with the newly uploaded CV file

quotes: Upload this CV to replace the old one in my portfolio

acceptanceCriteria: The old CV file is removed from frontend/public/assets/
The new CV file is placed at frontend/public/assets/Engr. Jerry E. Osiobe CV.pdf
The download link in HeroSection component continues to work with the same filename path

constraints: Do not modify the HeroSection component's download button link path
Maintain the exact filename 'Engr. Jerry E. Osiobe CV.pdf' to preserve existing references
nonGoals: Changing the CV filename or path structure
